info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 8:39PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Eddy, southern Lea, northwestern Reeves, northeastern Culberson and northwestern Loving Counties through 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/... At 938 PM CDT/838 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Malaga, or 23 miles southeast of Carlsbad, moving northeast at 25 mph. A separate storm was located northwest of Jal in Lea County. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loving, Malaga and Red Bluff Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for southeastern New Mexico...and western and southwestern Texas.
